snippet: CLOSE--Charles. Charles H. Close died at home in Key West, Florida at age 79 on January 22 after a brief illness. Born Norfolk, Virginia 1936. From Key West, Martha's Vineyard, MA, New York and Brookhaven, NY. He led a rich and varied life of many chapters -- as folk music manager, video and film producer, photographer, windsurfer, and author. He was a guide and mentor for many and will be missed by all those whose lives he helped to shape. He is survived by his loving wife Kira Madsen Close and step- daughter, Kim Wadsworth. Full obit at: www.legacy.com/Link.asp?I =LS000177678805X 1/3
